mapper.sql: id, createtime, flightsnumber, goodstype, expresstype, expressid, nextstop, nextstopname, scantype, scanners, scannerid, incname, incid, scantime, amount, Nextstop1, Nextstopname1,Tranname,isBagBill,goodsCount
mapper.insert:
insert into eforces_sentscan ( billsnumber,createtime,flightsnumber,goodstype,expresstype, expressid,nextstop,nextstopname,scantype,scanners, scannerid,incname,incid,scantime,amount,Nextstop1,Nextstopname1,Tranname,bz,goodsCount,isBagBill) values
( #{item.billsnumber}, now(), #{item.flightsnumber}, #{item.goodstype}, #{item.expresstype}, #{item.expressid}, #{item.nextstop}, #{item.nextstopname}, '发件扫描', #{item.scanners}, #{item.scannerid}, #{item.incname}, #{item.incid}, now(), #{item.amount}, #{item.nextstop1}, #{item.nextstopname1}, #{item.tranname}, #{item.bz}, #{item.goodsCount}, #{item.isBagBill} )
mapper.update:
update eforces_sentscan set isDelete=1 where id in
#{ids}
mapper.select:
select
,
from eforces_sentscan where isDelete=0 and sentScan.isBagBill = 0
and incid like CONCAT(#{_parameter},'%')
ORDER BY createtime DESC
SELECT count(*) from eforces_order bill join eforces_sentscan scan on bill.Number = scan.billsnumber where scan.incid = #{incid}

select sentScan.*, bagging.code as code from eforces_baggingscan bagging join eforces_sentscan sentScan on bagging.Numberlist = sentScan.billsnumber where sentScan.isDelete = 0 and sentScan.isBagBill = 1
and sentScan.incid like CONCAT(#{_parameter},'%')
ORDER BY createtime desc
